news.title: Chevron completes Hess acquisition after defeating Exxon in dispute over Guyana oil assets
news.summary: Chevron has prevailed against Exxon Mobil in a dispute over Hess Corporation's offshore oil assets in the South American nation of Guyana. Hess is a subsidiary of Chevron, which is based in California.

news.title: How the EU is preparing to reach a tariff deal in Trump's game of chicken
news.summary: The European Union is pushing to secure a trade deal with the U.S. ahead of President Donald Trump's Aug. 1 deadline. The EU is hoping to reach a deal before the end of the year.

news.title: As streaming services chase profitability, kids’ content is king
news.summary: Kids' programming like "CoComelon" and "Bluey" is becoming an important tool in retaining streaming customers as the services chase profitability.

news.title: Fed Chair Powell responds to White House questions about HQ renovation
news.summary: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell responded to OMB director Russ Vought's stern letter. Powell pointed him to a public website and previous statements.

news.title: 'Trump accounts' come with a $1,000 baby bonus. Then the rules get complicated, tax experts say
news.summary: Children born in 2025 through 2028 will receive a $1,000 deposit into a Trump account. Here's how the accounts work.

news.title: Only six dividend stocks pass a screen for quality — with yields up to 6.58%
news.summary: Investors need to look beyond yields to reduce the risk of suffering dividend cuts. Income-seeking investors need toLook beyond yields. Dividends need to be protected from the risks of inflation.

news.title: Schwab’s stock approaches all-time high as 1 million new brokerage accounts boost profit
news.summary: Charles Schwab's stock briefly sees record territory after an earnings beat. Charles Schwab’s stock briefly saw record territory following an earnings beating.

news.title: The kitchen sink has been thrown at the economy. Here’s why it’s not causing a recession.
news.summary: Low unemployment fuels spending, and more spending keeps unemployment low. Low unemployment fuels Spending, and More Spending keeps Unemployment Low. Low Unemployment fuels Spending,. and More spending keeps Unemployment low.

news.title: ‘Even God would get fired.’ The lessons this fund manager is taking from stock-market drawdowns and recoveries.
news.summary: One fund manager says studies on the drawdowns in the stock market shows the need to hold high-quality companies for the long term. He says studies show the need for long-term investing.

news.title: American Express earnings show healthy spending — including on these fancy categories
news.summary: Amex saw 7% growth in spending last quarter. Spending on front-of-cabin plane tickets and ‘high-value’ lodging transactions was up more than that.
